overview: Dr. Sam Lam is Dallas Plastic Surgeon and founder of the Lam Facial Plastics, a Dallas, Texas cosmetic surgery practice dedicated to facial plastic surgery. The procedures Dr. Sam Lam performs include Facial Rejuvenation, Facelift, Brow Lift, Fat Grafting, Eye lid Lift, Chin Augmentation, Cheek Augmentation, Hair Restoration, Rhinoplasty, Lip Augmentation, Lip Reduction, Otoplasty, Acne Scar Correction, Mole Removal and uses facial fillers including Botox, Restylane, Juvederm, and Perlane.
